Command.CommandString: SELECT WCS_TASK.*, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName,CMD_Product.ProductName, Sys_TableState.StateDesc,CMD_Car.StationNo, (case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in('5','6')) then CMD_Car.StationNo when WCS_TASK.TaskType in('12','13') or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in('0','1','2','3','4','7','9')) then WCS_TASK.CellCode else '' end) FromStation, (case when WCS_TASK.TaskType='11' or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in('5','6','7','9')) then WCS_TASK.CellCode when WCS_TASK.TaskType in('12') or (WCS_TASK.TaskType='14' and WCS_TASK.State in('0','1','2','3','4')) then CMD_Car.StationNo when WCS_TASK.TaskType='13' then WCS_TASK.ToCellCode else '' end) ToStation FROM WCS_TASK LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Car ON WCS_TASK.CarNo = CMD_Car.CarNo Left join CMD_Product ON WCS_TASK.ProductCode=CMD_Product.ProductCode left join CMD_BillType On CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode=WCS_TASK.BillTypeCode LEFT JOIN Sys_TableState on Sys_TableState.TableName='WCS_TASK' and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and WCS_TASK.State=Sys_TableState.State Where {0} ORDER BY WCS_TASK.TaskLevel DESC, WCS_TASK.RequestDate,WCS_TASK.StartDate

update CMD_Cell Set IsLock='0',ProductCode=Task.ProductCode,PalletCode=Task.PalletCode,Quantity=1,InDate=Task.FinishDate,BillNo=Task.BillID from CMD_Cell Inner Join WCS_Task Task On CMD_Cell.CellCode=Task.CellCode where Task.TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WCS_TASK set State=@State where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WCS_TASK set CarNo=@CarNo where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WCS_TASK set State=@State,StartDate=getdate() where TaskNo=@TaskNo
update WMS_BillMaster set State=@State where BillID=@BillID
update WCS_TASK set State=@State where TaskNo in (select top 1 TaskNo from WCS_TASK where State='1' and TaskType='11' and CarNo=@CarNo order by RequestDate)

SELECT CMD_Cell.CellCode, CMD_Cell.CellName, CMD_Cell.AreaCode, CMD_Area.AreaName, CMD_Cell.ShelfCode, CMD_Shelf.ShelfName, CMD_Cell.CellRow, CMD_Cell.CellColumn, CMD_Cell.IsActive, CMD_Cell.Priority, CMD_Cell.PalletCode, CMD_Cell.PalletBarcode, CMD_Cell.ProductCode, CMD_Product.ProductName, CMD_Cell.BillNo, WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName, CMD_Cell.Quantity, CMD_Cell.IsLock, CMD_Cell.ErrorFlag, CMD_Cell.InDate, CMD_Cell.Memo FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Area ON CMD_Cell.AreaCode = CMD_Area.AreaCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode LEFT OUTER JOIN WMS_BillMaster ON CMD_Cell.BillNo = WMS_BillMaster.BillID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_BillType ON WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode = CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Product ON CMD_Cell.ProductCode = CMD_Product.ProductCode ORDER BY CMD_Cell.CellCode

SELECT CMD_Cell.*, CMD_Area.AreaName, CMD_Cell.ShelfCode, CMD_Shelf.ShelfName, VCMD_Product.ProductName,VCMD_Product.ProductTypeName, WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName,CMD_ProductState.StateName FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Area ON CMD_Cell.AreaCode = CMD_Area.AreaCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode LEFT OUTER JOIN WMS_BillMaster ON CMD_Cell.BillNo = WMS_BillMaster.BillID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_BillType ON WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode = CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN VCMD_Product ON CMD_Cell.ProductCode = VCMD_Product.ProductCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_ProductState ON CMD_Cell.StateNo = CMD_ProductState.StateNo order by CMD_Cell.CellCode

SELECT CMD_Cell.CellCode, CMD_Cell.CellName, CMD_Cell.AreaCode, CMD_Area.AreaName, CMD_Cell.ShelfCode, CMD_Shelf.ShelfName, CMD_Cell.CellRow, CMD_Cell.CellColumn, CMD_Cell.IsActive, CMD_Cell.Priority, CMD_Cell.PalletCode, CMD_Cell.PalletBarcode, CMD_Cell.ProductCode, VCMD_Product.ProductName,VCMD_Product.ProductTypeName, CMD_Cell.BillNo, WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode, CMD_BillType.BillTypeName, CMD_Cell.Quantity, CMD_Cell.IsLock, CMD_Cell.ErrorFlag, CMD_Cell.InDate, CMD_Cell.Memo FROM CMD_Cell LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Area ON CMD_Cell.AreaCode = CMD_Area.AreaCode LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_Shelf ON CMD_Cell.ShelfCode = CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode LEFT OUTER JOIN WMS_BillMaster ON CMD_Cell.BillNo = WMS_BillMaster.BillID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMD_BillType ON WMS_BillMaster.BillTypeCode = CMD_BillType.BillTypeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN VCMD_Product ON CMD_Cell.ProductCode = VCMD_Product.ProductCode Where {0} order by CMD_Cell.CellCode
